name: Kill Zombie Drak Night 3D
description:
Kill Zombie Drak Night 3D is an action and creepy zombie shooting game with 3D dark mountain environment. The theme of this zombie kills game is very simple just kill the zombies and stay safe.
FEATURES

1. Excellent dark night mountain environments
2. Seven latest and modern guns for zombie killing
3. Joystick for movement up down left and right
4. Attractive user interface and background sound
5. Change your weapon at any time with the help of switch button
